# IJsonBoxClient.GetByIdAsync method

Returns a single record matching the ID.

```csharp
public Task<string> GetByIdAsync(string id)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| id | The ID of the record to return. |

## Return Value

The record as a JSON object, or an error message as a JSON object.
